name: Timer
description: Execute code at specified time intervals

static_functions.name: SetTimeout
static_functions.description: Executes a function, after waiting a specified number of milliseconds

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback that will be executed

parameters.name: milliseconds
parameters.description: The time in milliseconds to wait before executing the function

parameters.name: parameters...
parameters.description: Additional parameters to pass to the function

static_functions.name: SetInterval
static_functions.description: Same as SetTimeout(), but repeats the execution of the function continuously. Return false to stop it from being called.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback that will be executed

parameters.name: milliseconds
parameters.description: The time in milliseconds the timer should delay in between executions of the specified function

parameters.name: parameters...
parameters.description: Additional parameters to pass to the function

static_functions.name: ClearTimeout
static_functions.description: Stops the execution of the function specified in SetTimeout()

parameters.name: timeout_id
parameters.description: The ID value returned by SetTimeout() is used as the parameter for this method

static_functions.name: ClearInterval
static_functions.description: Stops the execution of the function specified in SetInterval()

parameters.name: interval_id
parameters.description: The ID value returned by SetInterval() is used as the parameter for this method

static_functions.name: Bind
static_functions.description: Binds a Timer to any Actor. The timer will be automatically cleared when the Actor is destroyed

static_functions.name: IsValid
static_functions.description: Checks if a Timer is currently active or waiting to be triggered

static_functions.name: GetElapsedTime
static_functions.description: Returns the time elapsed since the last tick

static_functions.name: GetRemainingTime
static_functions.description: Returns the time remaining to the next tick
